headline: RUSSIA 🐻💣 TURNS UKRAINE KIDS 👶🚫 into TELEGRAM SABOTAGE SIMPS 🤡💥 – BOMBS for BUCKS 😈💰 in RIVNE PARK PICKUP! ‼️
text:
YO UKRAINE 🇺🇦😤, RUSSIA 🐻🇷🇺 is SLIDING into DMs 📱💬 on TELEGRAM like a CREEPY UNCLE 👴😏, RECRUITING TEEN SIMPS 👦🤑 aged 11-17 to BLOW SHIT UP 💣💥 against their OWN HOMIES! Vlad 🕶️🚶‍♂️, 17yo EASTERN UKR BOI from 500 MILES AWAY 🗺️🏃‍♂️💨, HOPS a BUS to RIVNE PARK 🌳🪨 to SNAG a HIDDEN BOMB 💣📱 + BURNING PHONE 🔥📴 promised $2K 💵🍆 to PLANT in MILITARY CONSCRIPTION VAN 🚐🇺🇦! 'WIRING it up, I WAS SWEATING 😰💦 THOUGHT I'D GO BOOM 💥☠️,' he SPILLS to BBC 📰👀 – but SBU SECURITY SIMPS 🕵️‍♂️🚫 were WATCHING like HAWKS 🦅👀 and FOILED the PLOT! Now Vlad's CHILLING in RIVNE JAIL ⛓️😩 AWAITING 12YR TERROR TRIAL ⚖️🚨 cuz MOMMY UKRAINE ain't PLAYING! 'Nobody LIKES conscription CUCKS 👮‍♂️😡,' he SHRUGS 🤷‍♂️, but ADMITS he could've OFFED somebody 💀🍆!

SBU DROPPING BOMBSHELLS 💣📢: 800+ UKRAINIANS 🧑‍🤝‍🧑 recruited by PUTIN PUPPETS 🐻🎪 over 2 YRS, 240 MINORS 👶😢 some as YOUNG as 9-10! CYBER QUEEN Anastasiia Apetyk 🧑‍💻👩‍🔬 SPILLS TEA ☕: 'EVEN TINY KIDS getting PINGED!' National Police DEPUTY Andriy Nebytov 🚔💪 says RUSSIA TARGETS VULNERABLE NOOBS 🤡🎮 who DON'T GET the CONSEQUENCES 😵‍💫💥 – MAKING EXPLOSIVES from HOUSEHOLD CHEM GOO 🧪💨 to HIT ARMY OFFICES 🏢🔥 or POLICE STATIONS 🚔💣! Recruitment on TELEGRAM 📱🚫, TIKTOK 💃📹, even VIDEO GAMES 🎮👾 – ALL for THAT SWEET CRYPTO CASH 💰🤑, NOT cuz they STAN Russia! Vlad SAYS 'I AIN'T PRO-RUSSIA 🇷🇺🚫, just HUNTING REMOTE GIGS 💼📱' – BOOM, 'ROMAN' with STREET RUSSIAN ACCENT 😏🇷🇺 SLIDES in HALF HOUR ⏱️, HOOKS him with EASY PEASY TASKS!

FIRST HIT? GRAB a GRENADE 🧨🚫 (GONE, but PAID $30 ANYWAY 💸😏). NEXT: TORCH a CONSCRIPTION VAN 🔥🚐, FILM it 📹💨 and BOUNCE – SCORED $100 CRYPTO 🤑📈 (LESS than PROMISED, but 'DO THE BOMB JOB for REST!' LMAO 🤡💥). Those TELEGRAM CHANNELS 📱🔥 ain't BLATANT PRO-RUSS 🐻, but PUMP HATE on CORRUPT CONSCRIPTION BRUTALITY 👮‍♂️😠💰 – BBC JOINS with BURNER 📱🕶️, GETS PRICE LIST 💰📋: $1.5K for POST OFFICE ARSON 🔥🏢, $3K for BANK 💰🏦 cuz 'SECURITY GLASS = MOLOTOV COCKTAILS 🍹💣 or PETROL POUR!' One RECRUITER YELLS 'GIMME ALL THE ARSON 👋🔥, RELIABLE SIMPS HARDER to FIND than DOUGH!' Even REFUGEE GROUPS 👥🏃‍♂️ and BEAUTY TIP CHATS 💅📱 got GIG ADS! BBC RATS 'em to TELEGRAM 🚫📱, they NIX a FEW but MOST STILL LIVE 😤📈 – ONE CHANNEL GAINED 750 SIMPS since! TELEGRAM SHRUGS: 'NO VIOLENCE ALLOWED 😇🚫' YEAH RIGHT 🤥!

EURO COPS 🇪🇺🚔 CONFIRM RUSS AGENTS 🕵️‍♂️🐻 recruiting YOUNG DUDES for ARSON 🔥 & SPY SHIT 👀 in UK, where 6 MEN JAIL'd for LONDON WAREHOUSE BLAZE 🏭🔥 aiding UKRAINE! In UA, HUNDREDS AWAITING TRIAL ⚖️😩, but some GO BOOM 💥☠️ – SBU SAYS HANDLERS REMOTELY DETONATE to COVER TRACKS! MARCH 17YO DEAD 💀, 15YO MANGLED 😵 from RAIL BOMB FUMBLE 🚂💣. RUSS EMBASSY FINGERPOINTS 🫵😡: 'UKRAINE does SAME with RUSSIAN KIDS!' But Vlad's FINAL BANGER 💥📢: 'DON'T BITE BAIT 🪝🚫 – THEY CHEAT ya INTO JAIL ⛓️ or BLOW YA UP 💣☠️!' PUTIN'S TELEGRAM TRAP 🕸️📱 got UKR TEENS SIMPIN' for SCRAPS 💰🤡 while RUSSIA LAUGHS 🐻😂 – STAY WOKE, KIDS! 😤👀🇺🇦
